Description: Acacia (?) wood double kohl-tube with a swivel-lid of darker wood; one inlay-segment from the spine is lost; a kohl-stick is inserted into the central groove.
Curator's comments: Published: Les amour d'une princesse égyptienne, Saint-Gérard 1997, p.121 [81].
Exhibition history: Exhibited: 1997 May-Oct, Abbaye Saint-Gerard De Brogne, Le Roman de la momie 1998/9 Oct-Jun, South Carolina, The Charleston Museum, Queens Commoners of the New Kingdom 2001 26 Jun-23 Sep, Birmingham Gas Hall, Egypt Revealed 2009 Apr-present, Swaffham Museum, Egyptian Gallery, LT Loan
Condition: fair - some inlay lost from the spine
